description:
Prepare for CCNP ROUTE exam success with this free course from Chris Bryant, "The Computer Certification Bulldog"! This ad-free course brings you over an hour of my clear and comprehensive Video Boot Camp instruction, tackling some of the toughest topics you'll see on the ROUTE exam. That includes OSPF stub and total stub areas!

Join today! The instruction is great and you can't beat the cost!

Chris B.
title: CCNP ROUTE 2015 Free Video Boot Camp:  BGP Success
